thread.title: OFFICIAL: Medeama to start pre-season training on Oct 31
thread.title_full: OFFICIAL: Medeama to start pre-season training on Oct 31

title: OFFICIAL: Medeama to start pre-season training on Oct 31
text:
18:10 CET OFFICIAL: Medeama to start pre-season training on Oct 31 - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
The Mauve and Yellows took a well- deserved break following their FA Cup triumph over Asante Kotoko in August. 
The Tarkwa-based side will start preparations ahead of a busy schedule next season which include their participation in the CAF Confederation Cup next year. 
'Medeama will start pre-season training on October 31 to prepare for the new season,' a club statement read 
'We believe the players have had enough rest after a fine campaign last term. 
'The training session of the team will be supervised by coach Tom Strand. 
We will like to urge our supporters to continue to support us in prayers as we strive for excellence in the upcoming season. 
'Management will inform the supporters in due course the acquisition of new players and those who will be transfer-listed.' 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
